column1: #Text=Bumi says : " Maybe you boys have n't heard , but there 's some new airbenders on these parts .
#Text=I really felt it coming at me .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm proud of you .
#Text=Your connection with the spirits , natural leadership , you remind me of Dad .
#Text=" Bumi says : " I 'm sorry I 've been causing you so much trouble .
#Text=I guess I was just scared of not being able to measure up as an airbender .
#Text=You know , even though I 'm Aang 's son , I never really felt that I was a part of the Air Nation before .
